\section{SF36 data to be passed to the functions}

The abbreviations are as follows

\begin{itemize}
\item PF Physical Functionning score ranging from 0 to 100
\item RP Role limitations due to Physical health score ranging from 0 to 100
\item BP Bodily Pain score ranging from 0 to 100
\item GH General Health score ranging from 0 to 100
\item VT Vitality score ranging from 0 to 100
\item SF Social Functioning score ranging from 0 to 100
\item RE Role limitations due to Emotional problems score ranging from 0 to 100
\item MH General Mental Health score ranging from 0 to 100
\item AGE Patient's age ranging from 0 to 110
\item GENDER Patient's gender coded as male=1 and female=2.
\end{itemize}
